name: Super Acne Fighter / Organic Acne Treatment / Acne
description:
This highly requested custom item is a powerful acne, blemish, and scar fighter for your face. It combines high-quality, organic antioxidant oils to provide a daily tincture for your skin. Acne can be caused by dry skin, leading to excess oil buildup. This oil serum balances natural skin oils while fighting bacteria that cause acne.
Apply a clean cotton ball to your face twice daily after cleansing but before moisturizing. If using a toner, apply it before the Acne Fighter. Oils nourish and fight acne, revealing clear skin. You may not need moisturizer during the first few uses. Your skin may change during treatment. Best used with our green or healing turmeric face soaps. B’s full of super acne fighters! The strong scent indicates effectiveness.

Ingredients: Tamanu Oil*, Sea Buckthorn Oil*, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Aloe Vera*, Macadamia Nut Oil, Kukui Nut Oil, Coconut Oil*, Neem Oil*, Olive Oil*, Vitamin E*, Honey*, Hemp Seed Oil*, Calendula*, Lavender EO*, Tea Tree
*Certified Organic

Stored in a recyclable 4oz. glass bottle for reuse or recycling.



- Organic
- Non-GMO
- Cruelty-free
- Sulfate-free, phthalate-free, and paraben-free
- No synthetic dyes or fragrances
- Printed on recycled paper from eco-friendly soy-based inks
- All-natural and safe
- Zero-waste company
- Upcycled packaging whenever possible

Made with love <3
